title: Defender: Colin Todd
creator_credit: Terry Ryan, Ray Marshall and I S L E
brief_description: Colin Todd, one of the British Football League’s most respected back-four players, shows that defenders need more than just brute force. He illustrates that positional play and marking are just as vital as tackling and clearing the ball.
creator_credit_for_label: Terry Ryan, Ray Marshall and I S L E
